data.title: Scottish Tourism Alliance
data.text:
Johnston Fuels

STA Platinum Patron

“Johnston Fuels are proud to support the Scottish Tourism Alliance (STA), providing an excellent opportunity to continue their commitment to local communities and businesses. Based in Bathgate, West Lothian, Johnston Fuels has been on the road since 1965 distributing oil, kerosene, LPG and biomass products to over 30,000 domestic and commercial customers across Scotland and England. This exclusive STA offer is designed to support members with discounted fuel; or provide a bespoke fuel package with flexible payment terms to meet your requirements.”

Johnston Fuels have been on the road since 1965, distributing oil, kerosene and LPG to domestic and business customer’s right across Scotland and parts of England. As well as offering a range of Fuel Cards and heating services.
